ValidationRule.description: Treatment expiration date cannot be equal or less than Pending Opportunity expiration date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Expiration_Date__c <= Pending_Opp_Expiration__c, ISCHANGED (Status__c), OR( TEXT(PRIORVALUE (Status__c)) = "Available", TEXT(PRIORVALUE (Status__c)) = "Creating Treatment"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Pending Opportunity"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Treatment Expiration Date must be greater than Pending Opp Expiration Date.
